FRC Calculus
=============

.. meta::
   :description lang=en: Enough Calc for FRC

Good news if you dreaded learning (single variable) calculus for FRC, you barely need to know it, I'd argue that you don't need to know it at all if you never want to understand a PID 

Calculus is almost exclusively used in two things for FRC, PID (Proportional, Integral, Derivative) and advanced Motion Profilling, neither of which actually use calculus.

The two fundamental concepts of Calculus are Derivatives and Integrals

Derivatives
